data.name: HunieCam Studio Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The official digital soundtrack for HunieCam Studio including all 8 tracks from the game and an exclusive bonus track!
data.about_the_game: The official digital soundtrack for HunieCam Studio including all 8 tracks from the game and an exclusive bonus track!
data.short_description: The official digital soundtrack for HunieCam Studio including all 8 tracks from the game and an exclusive bonus track!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 350 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains adult content including frequent nudity, sexual dialog, sexual scenes/scenarios, references to drug/alcohol use, and anime boobies.
